response.job_title: Global Brand Director Disruptive Innovation at Procter & Gamble
response.summary:
I am an Industrial Engineer with a passion for driving innovation and category development in the healthcare sector. Leveraging my proficiency in English, German, French, and Spanish, I thrive in multicultural environments and aspire to improve consumer health outcomes.

Expertise:

🚀 Strategic Innovation: With a 12-year tenure at Procter & Gamble, I have consistently demonstrated leadership and disruptive thinking. My innovation strategies have fueled the expansion of the Oral-B & Crest brand portfolio across India, Middle East, Africa, Europe and Latin America, resulting in category and market share growth. Currently, I’m designing the future of Oral Health with a multidisciplinary team.

💼 Business Model Design & Market Expansion: : I’ve designed and implemented tailored business models that accelerate category growth and drive profitability. By leveraging deep market insights and consumer understanding, I have successfully optimized product portfolios to meet specific market demands, effectively driven market entry and established strong brand positioning.

🤝 Cross-Functional Collaboration: Collaborating seamlessly with cross-functional teams, including R&D, design, marketing, logistics, regulatory, legal and sales, has been pivotal in ensuring the successful execution of projects and product launches. Proven ability to work across different departments and geographies.

💡 Embracing Innovation in Healthcare: Passionately committed to healthcare management, I continuously seek opportunities to improve patient health outcomes. My studies at EPFL CAS in Life Science and HEC Lausanne have equipped me with understanding of MedTech, Pharma, Biotech and Consumer Healthcare industries.

🤝 Passion for Mentorship and Community Involvement: Firmly believe in the exceptional value of youth and female development. Currently, Mentor for Femtech start-up accelerator Tech4Eva, offering strategic guidance in Business Strategy and Marketing. Find immense fulfillment in contributing to the growth and empowerment of budding entrepreneurs.

Open to meaningful conversations, whether exploring potential collaborations, exchanging insights, or discussing industry trends. Feel free to reach out via LinkedIn messaging. Let's connect and explore opportunities to drive positive impact together.
response.skills: Innovation Management, Healthcare Industry, Healthcare Management, Financial Accounting, Marketing Strategy, Market Research, Customer Insight, Business Strategy, Marketing Management, Product Development, Project Management, Team Leadership, Strategic Planning, Consumer Products, Logistics, Logistics Engineering, Logistics Management, Cross-functional Team Leadership, FMCG, Brand Management

profile_positions.title: Global Brand Director Disruptive Innovation & New Business Models
Global Brand Director Oral Care - Sustainability & Packaging Innovation
Brand Director Oral Care India, Middle East & Africa

profile_positions.description:
- Responsible for regional Oral-B brand strategy, innovation and equity building initiatives from ideation to launch.
- Managed cross-functional team to implement new business models and innovation plans for total category.
- Developed and qualified multi-target marketing campaigns (consumer, dentist, store-owner).
profile_positions.title: Senior Brand Manager Oral Care India, Middle East & Africa

profile_positions.description:
- Formulated 3-year brand strategy and 5-year innovation pipeline, turning key opportunities into established projects. 
- Designed and implemented business plan to enter new market segment including product, packaging and go-to-market strategy. The project was reapplied globally across emerging markets and reached markets in <10 months.
- Developed communication strategy to step-change brand awareness of Oral-B toothpaste.
profile_positions.title: Senior Brand Manager Oral Care Western Europe, Middle East & Africa

profile_positions.description:
- Responsible for brand and business strategy, P&L and innovation plan for denture category launch in Latin America.
- Led paste portfolio strategy to improve profitability and partner with R&D to improve cost structure.
- Formulated and executed the business plan to enter into treatment segment with a portfolio for gum care and sensitivity relief.
profile_positions.title: Senior Brand Manager Oral Care - Toothpaste & Denture Latam

profile_positions.description:
- Led business model review to regain market leadership in Mexico. Analysis shaped next 3-yrs business interventions on innovation, go-to-market and packaging for entire region. 
- Managed partnership with Disney to launch kids portfolio with TV and In-store support w/o incremental investment from P&G.
- Developed and executed digital strategy in Mexico & Brazil. Reached high-end consumers with a cost-effective mix of platforms to deliver150 Ix vs. booklet in eCommerce sales in electric brush and Whitestrips launch.
profile_positions.title: Brand Manager Oral Care Brushing, Kids & Digital Latam
Marketing Intern Fabric Care Downy Latam

company.name: Procter & Gamble
company.description:
P&G was founded more than 185 years ago as a soap and candle company. Today, we’re one of the world’s largest consumer goods companies and home to iconic, trusted brands, including Always®, Charmin®, Braun®, Fairy®, Febreze®, Gillette®, Head & Shoulders®, Oral B®, Pantene®, Pampers®, Tide®, and Vicks®. 
 
The design, development, growth and success of these products—and many more—is thanks to the innovative and insightful minds of our people. From Day 1, you’ll help make everyday life easier for our 5 billion consumers. 
 
There is no single equation for success at P&G, because no two P&G people or careers are alike. Just as we strive to deliver a superior consumer experience, we aim to deliver a superior employee value equation as well. With our large global footprint, there are many opportunities to work with P&G in multiple locations. We offer opportunities in approximately 70 countries and continually aim to attract, reward and advance the finest people in the world. 
 
Here, we want you to get your career off to a fast start. That's why we don't have any rotational development programs or gradual ramping-up periods: you’ll be able—and encouraged—to dive right in from Day 1. Join us and help make life better through meaningful work that makes an impact from Day 1.
